home.subtitle: Find great deals on products from sellers worldwide. Buy and sell with ease!
home.latestListingsDesc: Discover the newest products added by our community of sellers
home.noListingsDesc: Be the first to create a listing and start selling your products!
home.locationEnabled: Location enabled! You can now see distances to listings.
home.locationFailed: Location access failed: {error}. You can still browse listings, but distance information won't be available.
home.enableLocation: Enable location to see distances to listings?

auth.title: Sign In / Register
auth.description: Enter your email to receive a magic link for passwordless authentication
auth.checkEmail: Check your email to complete sign-in.
auth.waitMessage: Please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting another magic link.
auth.footerText: We'll send you a secure link to sign in instantly.

listings.title: Browse Listings
listings.noListingsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters.
listings.noListingsAvailable: No listings are available at the moment.
listings.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting your search or filters.
listings.available: No listings are available at the moment.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your listings and view statistics
dashboard.noListingsDesc: Create your first listing to get started
dashboard.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this listing?

newListing.title: Create New Listing
newListing.subtitle: Fill in the details for your new product listing

editListing.title: Edit Listing
editListing.subtitle: Update your listing details
editListing.makeChanges: Make changes to your listing information
editListing.uploadNewImages: Upload new images to replace current ones. You can select multiple images and choose which one appears as default.
editListing.listingNotFoundDesc: The listing you're trying to edit doesn't exist or you don't have permission to edit it.

chat.signInToView: Please sign in to view messages
chat.manageConversations: Manage your conversations with buyers and sellers
chat.deleteConversationsDesc: Are you sure you want to delete {count} conversation(s) and all their messages?
chat.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove all messages from the selected conversations.
chat.conversationsDeleted: {count} conversation(s) and all messages deleted successfully
